privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.information_collect_desc: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, contact customer service, or otherwise interact with our services. This information may include:
privacy.contact_info: Contact information (name, email address, mailing address, phone number)
privacy.payment_info: Payment information (credit card details, billing address)
privacy.information_use_desc: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.communicate: Communicate with you about products, services, and promotions
privacy.information_sharing_desc: We may share your information with:
privacy.service_providers: Service providers who perform services on our behalf
privacy.payment_processors: Payment processors to process your payments
privacy.shipping_companies: Shipping companies to deliver your orders
privacy.legal_authorities: Legal authorities when required by law
privacy.no_selling: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy.cookies_desc: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your browsing activities and to manage your preferences. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy.data_security_desc: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy.your_rights_desc: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as:
privacy.children_desc: Our services are not directed to children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 16, please contact us.
privacy.changes_desc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
privacy.contact_desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@cinematicbeauty.com.

home.hero_description: Explore our collection of premium cosmetics designed to enhance your natural beauty.
home.premium_quality_desc: All our products are made with high-quality ingredients that are safe for your skin.
home.cruelty_free_desc: We never test on animals and are committed to ethical beauty practices.
home.fast_shipping_desc: Get your beauty products delivered quickly with our efficient shipping service.

about.title: About Cinematic Beauty Store
about.description: Your premier destination for high-quality beauty and cosmetic products.
about.story_content: Founded in 2020, Cinematic Beauty Store was born from a passion for high-quality beauty products and a desire to make premium cosmetics accessible to everyone. What started as a small online boutique has grown into a trusted destination for beauty enthusiasts around the world.
about.mission_content: At Cinematic Beauty Store, our mission is to empower individuals to express themselves through beauty. We believe that everyone deserves access to high-quality, ethically-sourced beauty products that enhance their natural beauty and boost their confidence.
about.quality_desc: We carefully curate our product selection, partnering only with brands that meet our strict quality standards.
about.sustainability_desc: We prioritize environmentally-friendly products and packaging to minimize our ecological footprint.
about.inclusivity_desc: We believe beauty is for everyone, regardless of age, gender, skin tone, or background.
about.transparency_desc: We provide clear information about our products, ingredients, and business practices.
about.commitment_content: We are committed to providing exceptional customer service, fast shipping, and a hassle-free shopping experience. Our team of beauty experts is always available to help you find the perfect products for your needs.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Find answers to common questions about our products, shipping, returns, and more.
faqs.still_have_questions: Still have questions? We're here to help!
faqs.order_question: How do I place an order?
faqs.order_answer: You can place an order by browsing our products, adding items to your cart, and proceeding to checkout. Follow the steps to provide shipping and payment information to complete your purchase.
faqs.payment_question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.payment_answer: We accept credit/debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely.
faqs.delivery_question: How long will it take to receive my order?
faqs.delivery_answer: Delivery times vary depending on your location. Typically, domestic orders are delivered within 3-5 business days, while international orders may take 7-14 business days.
faqs.cancel_question: Can I change or cancel my order?
faqs.cancel_answer: You can modify or cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it. Please contact our customer service team as soon as possible.
faqs.shipping_answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location.
faqs.cruelty_free_answer: Yes, all our products are cruelty-free and not tested on animals. We are committed to ethical beauty practices.
faqs.damaged_question: What if I receive a damaged product?
faqs.damaged_answer: If you receive a damaged product, please contact us within 48 hours with photos of the damage. We will arrange a replacement or refund.
faqs.loyalty_question: Do you have a loyalty program?
faqs.loyalty_answer: Yes, we offer a rewards program where you earn points for purchases, reviews, and referrals. These points can be redeemed for discounts on future orders.

shipping.title: Shipping Information
shipping.description: Learn about our shipping options, delivery times, and costs.
shipping.order_processing_desc: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days.
shipping.tracking_desc: All orders include tracking information that will be emailed to you once your order ships.
shipping.customs_desc: International customers may be subject to customs fees and import duties, which are the responsibility of the recipient.
shipping.restrictions_desc: Some products cannot be shipped to certain countries due to regulations. We will notify you if this affects your order.
shipping.questions_help: Have questions about shipping? We're here to help!

returns.page_description: Learn about our return process, eligibility, and refund policies.
returns.step1: Log in to your account and navigate to your order history.
returns.step2: Select the order containing the item(s) you wish to return.
returns.step3: Click on "Return Items" and select the specific products.
returns.step4: Choose a reason for your return from the dropdown menu.
returns.step5: Print the provided return shipping label.
returns.step6: Package the item(s) securely in their original packaging if possible.
returns.step7: Drop off the package at your nearest shipping location.
returns.damaged_description: If you receive a damaged or defective item, please contact our customer service team within 48 hours of delivery. Please include:
returns.include_description: Description of the damage or defect
returns.replacement_promise: We will arrange for a replacement or refund as soon as possible.
returns.questions_help: Have questions about returns? We're here to help!
returns.condition: Products must be unused, in original packaging
returns.process: Fill out the return form in your account or contact customer service
returns.refund: Processed within 5-7 business days after receiving the returned items
returns.exceptions: Sale items and personal hygiene products cannot be returned

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Please read these terms carefully before using our services.
terms.acceptance_content: By accessing or using the Cinematic Beauty Store website, mobile application, or any other services offered by Cinematic Beauty Store (collectively, the "Services"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our Services.
terms.changes_content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will provide notice of any material changes by updating the "Last Updated" date at the top of this page. Your continued use of the Services after such modifications will constitute your acknowledgment and agreement to the modified terms.
terms.registration_content: To access certain features of our Services, you may be required to register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.
terms.conduct_content: You agree not to use the Services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You agree to comply with all laws, rules, and regulations applicable to your use of the Services.
terms.products_content: All product descriptions, pricing, and availability are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to limit quantities of any products or services that we offer.
terms.payment_content: By providing a payment method, you represent that you are authorized to use the designated payment method and you authorize us to charge your payment method for all purchases you make.
terms.shipping_content: Shipping times and costs are estimates and may vary based on factors outside our control. We are not responsible for delays in delivery once the package has been handed over to the shipping carrier.
terms.returns_content: Please refer to our Returns Policy for information about returns, refunds, and exchanges.
terms.intellectual_content: All content included on the Services, such as text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Cinematic Beauty Store or its content suppliers and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
terms.liability_content: In no event shall Cinematic Beauty Store be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or related to your use of the Services.
terms.governing_content: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Cinematic Beauty Store operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms.contact_content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@cinematicbeauty.com.
